name: berry cute strawberry bucket hat
sizes_available: 0-3 months, 6-12 months, 2-5 years, 6-10 years, teen / adult, large adult
notes:
create your very own adorable strawberry-themed bucket hat with this fun and easy-to-follow crochet pattern! perfect for summer, the berry cute strawberry crochet bucket hat pattern is designed to be beginner-friendly, using basic crochet stitches to create a cute and stylish hat for all ages.
  
pattern includes instructions for the following sizes:
• 0 - 3 months
• 6 - 12 months
• 2 - 5 years
• 6 - 10 years
• teen / adult
• large adult
  
**printable, ad-free pdf versions of the pattern are available in my ravelry shop or** [**here**](https://tidd.ly/3w90lcx) **in my etsy shop, which includes the pattern instructions for all sizes.**
  
**pattern details:**
  
**skill level:** easy
**terminology:** us crochet terms
**language:** english
  
**materials needed:**
• 3.5mm (e) crochet hook
• 4.0 mm (g) crochet hook
• we crochet dishie (100% cotton, worsted weight (4), 190yds/174m, 100g/3.5oz), 1 skein each of:
o color a: fiesta red
o color b: jalapeno
o color c: butterscotch
• polyester stuffing
• scissors
• tapestry needle
• stitch marker
